frolic.enableLogging.description: Enable or disable Frolic passive logging

frolic.apiBaseUrl.description: Base URL for Frolic API endpoints. Automatically uses localhost:3000 in development.

frolic.digestFrequencyHours.description: How often to send coding activity digests to Frolic (in hours). Default is 24 hours (daily).

frolic.maxBufferSize.description: Maximum number of events to keep in memory buffer. Higher values capture more activity but use more memory.

frolic.maxMemoryMB.description: Maximum memory usage for activity buffer in MB. Buffer will be trimmed if this limit is exceeded.

enumDescriptions: Short-lived tokens (15 minutes) with automatic refresh
Long-lived tokens (90 days) - authenticate once per install
frolic.tokenExpiration.description: Token expiration preference. Long-lived tokens mean you only need to authenticate once when installing the extension.

walkthroughs.title: Welcome to Frolic
walkthroughs.description: Get started with personalized coding insights and recaps

steps.title: Welcome to Frolic!
steps.description:
Frolic passively tracks your coding activity to provide personalized insights and learning recaps. Let's get you set up!

[Open Frolic Activity Panel](command:frolic-activity.focus)

steps.title: Sign In to Enable Cloud Sync
steps.description:
Sign in to sync your coding activity and receive personalized recaps via email.

[Sign In to Frolic](command:frolic.signIn)

*Note: Frolic works locally without signing in, but you'll miss out on personalized insights and recaps.*

steps.title: You're All Set!
steps.description:
Frolic is now tracking your coding activity. Check the Frolic Activity panel in the Explorer to see your progress.

**Next steps:**
- Start coding to see activity tracking
- Check your email for personalized recaps
- Explore settings with `Frolic:` in the Command Palette

[Send Test Digest](command:frolic.sendDigest)
